original_title: Former UK Health Secretary Hancock visits BOI
original_body_lines: UK’s former Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport and Secretary of State for Health Matthew Hancock paid a courtesy call to the Board of Investment to understand Sri Lanka’s readiness for doing-business in multiple sectors and the current economic situation post-IMF program. Former cricketer Aravinda de Silva and several International Fund Managers were associated in the discussions.
